scripts.tsc: cp src/sqlite.d.ts plugin && cp README.md plugin && tsc -skipLibCheck
scripts.demo.ios: pnpm i && pnpm run tsc && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: pnpm i && pnpm run tsc && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.clean: rimraf plugin/ios plugin/android plugin/**/*.d.ts plugin/**/*.js plugin/**/*.js.map plugin/node_modules plugin/package-lock.json
scripts.test.android: pnpm run build && cd ./demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: pnpm run build && cd ./demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.test.android.verbose: pnpm run build  && cd ./demo && tns build android && tns test android
scripts.test.ios.verbose: pnpm run build  && cd ./demo && tns build ios && tns test ios
